ASHOK MENON, J.
—¢rT.MC No.8539 of 2019
Dated this the 10% day of January, 2020
ORDER

Petitioners are accused in Crime No.1162/2019 of
Kuravilangadu Police Station for having allegedly
committed offences punishable under Sections 294(b),
341, 323 and 326 read with Section 34 IPC.

2. The only defacto complainant/injured is the
third respondent herein. He has appeared through
counsel and filed an affidavit to the effect that the
matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners
and that he has no grievance against them. A report to
that effect has also been obtained from the
investigating officer through the learned Senior Public
Prosecutor. The petitioners do not have any criminal
antecedents. No public interest is involved. The
injury sustained by the third respondent is not life
threatening.

In the result, the Criminal M.cC. is allowed and

2020/KER/1355
Cr. MC 8539/2019
4

the entire proceedings as against the petitioners
herein in Crime No.1162/2019 of Kuravilangadu Police
Station shall stand quashed under Section 482 cr.PcC and
the petitioners/accused are discharged.

Sd/-

ASHOK MENON

JUDGE
